title: Charming 3 Bed, 2 Bath in North Austin
posting_body: Ideally located for major tech employers like Dell, Samsung, or IBM, you have the best of both worlds.
Live, work, and relax in this serene sanctuary!
Enjoy the resort-style pool, the hot tub, and the adjacent sundeck, or stop by our fitness center for an energizing workout.
On our grounds, residents have picnic areas with grill stations, a lovely clubhouse with a business center, and they also benefit from our teams maintenance and management services.
Open floor plan invites you to decorate your day-to-day scene & spacious rooms are bathed in sunlight.
It's your time & place to build your life story!
I appreciate my clients and gift loyalty rebates of $50-$250.00!
Christena Barry - Award Winning Locator & Realtor
*Pics show general property, not necessarily particular unit.
